accountability_for_self.truth: Real accountability is to self, to truth, to the mirror - not to the system
accountability_for_self.reality: The mirror holds us accountable. We cannot fool ourselves.
accountability_for_self.application: Practice daily mirror reflections. Own your actions. Be truthful with yourself.

broken_people_make_mistakes.truth: We are all broken. Mistakes are part of being human, not criminal.
broken_people_make_mistakes.reality: We all make mistakes. The difference is healing vs punishment.
broken_people_make_mistakes.application: Shift from 'criminal' to 'person who made a mistake'. Focus on healing, not labeling.

our_lies_are_to_ourselves.truth: We lie to ourselves more than we lie to others. We hide from ourselves.
our_lies_are_to_ourselves.reality: The mirror never lies. You can't fool yourself when you look in the mirror.
our_lies_are_to_ourselves.application: Daily self-reflection. Ask: What am I avoiding looking at? Where am I lying to myself?

accountable_for_actions.principle: We must be accountable for our actions
accountable_for_actions.truth: Owning actions, understanding roots, making amends, healing brokenness
accountable_for_actions.lie: Just do your time and you've paid
accountable_for_actions.reality: True accountability means restoration, not just punishment served.
accountable_for_actions.application: Acknowledge what happened. Understand why. Make amends. Heal the root cause.

community_justice_councils.structure: 7-13 community members (rotating, diverse), trained in restorative justice
process: Truth Circle: Person shares what happened (no lawyers, just truth)
Community Listens: Council listens without judgment, seeks to understand
Root Cause Exploration: Why did this happen? What brokenness led here?
Restoration Plan: How do we heal? What amends are needed?
Community Support: How does community support healing and reintegration?
community_justice_councils.outcome: Restoration, not punishment. Healing, not exclusion.

steps: Acknowledge the Truth: What happened? (from all perspectives)
Understand the Root: Why did this happen? (brokenness, not criminality)
Hear the Harm: Who was harmed? How? (from victims/community)
Make Amends: What restoration is needed? (not punishment, but healing)
Heal Together: How do we move forward? (reintegration, not exclusion)
truth_and_reconciliation.focus: Truth, not winning. Healing, not punishment. Community, not system.

components: Honest assessment of actions and impacts
accountability_mirrors.truth: You can't fool yourself in the mirror. The mirror reflects truth.

components.acknowledgment: I acknowledge what happened and the harm caused
components.understanding: I understand why this happened (root cause)
components.amends: I commit to these specific actions to make amends
components.healing: I commit to healing the root brokenness (therapy, support, etc.)
components.community: I commit to community reintegration (not isolation)

restoration_contracts.duration: Based on healing, not time. When restoration is complete, contract is complete.
restoration_contracts.record: No criminal record. Only restoration record (for community healing, not future punishment).

healing_centers.duration: Based on healing, not fixed sentences

final_declaration: Broken people make mistakes. Our lies are to ourselves. We must be accountable for our actions. The mirror never lies. You can't fool yourself. Wear your vulnerabilities. Take accountability for self. The global law system is broken. We replace punishment with restoration. We replace judgment with understanding. We replace system with community. We replace brokenness with healing. This is truth-based accountability. This is restorative justice. This is community over system. This is healing over punishment. This is truth over lies.
